attributes.action: How can Liberia quarantine a city while you lot of total morons REFUSE to treat the Ebola outbreak with ANY cogent action.
attributes.additional_details: Could it be because you know you will NEVER be held to account if millions of British citizens are killed as a direct result of your imbecilic dithering over the matter.  IT IS MY BELIEF THAT OUR ELECTEDS ARE LOSING MORE AND MORE OF THE RESPECT OF THE PEOPLE ON A DAILY BASIS AND WILL SHORTLY BE FACING THE EQUIVALENT OF MADAME LA GUILLOTINE ON FRENCH POLITICIANS 200 YEARS AGO.  The sooner the better!
